thread.title: Former WWE Superstar Kaitlyn splitting with husband
thread.title_full: Former WWE Superstar Kaitlyn splitting with husband

author: Abir
title: Former WWE Superstar Kaitlyn splitting with husband
text:
Home / Headlines / Former WWE Superstar Kaitlyn splitting with husband Former WWE Superstar Kaitlyn splitting with husband By Abir on February 27, 2017 @wordsofabir Filed under: Headlines , WWE News 1 share 
24 comments WWE 
Former WWE Divas champion Celeste Bonin (famously known as Kaitlyn) announced via her Instagram that she will be splitting with her husband PJ Braun . 
In her Instagram post she stated that her website, Celestial Bodiez, had its domain taken down and her company can now be found at celestialbodiezz.com . 
During the video blog posted on the social media site, the former WWE Superstar announced that it was her soon-to-be ex-husband that took down the domain, as he had ownership over it. 
As the two combined their companies together, they will now be splitting them up once again, and working without one another. 
Despite the issue, Kaitlyn remains positive and hopes to gain access to the original domain within the next day. 
Kaitlyn got married to Braun on June 20th, 2014 , after meeting years prior to that on the bodybuilding circuit. 
Diva Dirt would like to send our best wishes to both Celeste and PJ the best of luck in their future. 
What do you think of the situation? Any well wishes to share to either party? Let us know your views in the comments below! 
Hopefully this opens up a return to wrestling LaurenYorkStan
